message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $90?
I'm not sure I can go up to $90, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $82?
